description: Dispatched when an entity has thoughts without speech (e.g., an LLM character thinking but not speaking).

entityId.description: The ID of the entity that had thoughts.

thoughts.description: The entity's internal thoughts or monologue.

notes.description: Optional notes or annotations about the thoughts.

subjectType.description: The type of subject (e.g., character, location, emotion).

suppressDisplay.description: If true, skip UI display bubbles while still logging perceptible events.
